pkgfinal

Class RecipeBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgfinal.Recipe
      • pkgfinal.RecipeBox

  • public class RecipeBox
extends Recipe
    Program that creates a RecipeBox in which to store a collection of Recipes and their Ingredients Use as driver class for final submission.
